name: Car Tower Defense
description:
Car Tower Defense is a combination of a tower defense game and a racing game.

The zombies are trying to detroy your beacon.
You kill them by either driving over them or shooting them with your gun.

How to play:
-Drive around with the arrow keys or WASD
-Aim with your mouse and click to shoot
-Kill zombies by running them over or shooting them
-Kill as much zombies as possible before they destroy your beacon
